results.content: I am very fond of John's teachings - very clear and to the point. I got helpful new insights  to progress with WordPress. The only thing which I missed were the explanations about building a membership site. In the introduction of the course John mentioned this as part of the course. I think it would be helpful if he either changed the introduction in order not to overpromise or to add the missing content about the membership site. Then I would gladly give five stars for this course.
results.content_html: I am very fond of John's teachings - very clear and to the point. I got helpful new insights to progress with WordPress. The only thing which I missed were the explanations about building a membership site. In the introduction of the course John mentioned this as part of the course. I think it would be helpful if he either changed the introduction in order not to overpromise or to add the missing content about the membership site. Then I would gladly give five stars for this course.

results.content: The course is very basic. It only shows how to customize one particular theme, and the customizations themselves are not extensive.  Many simple concepts are repeated too often whilst others are glossed over far too quickly, or not addressed at all, especially during the later modules.  As another student commented, copying and pasting is not teaching.  Having said all that, the instructor is very personable, and the example he uses is a real-world web site, and that in itself is a good basis for such a course.  The trouble-shooting approach he used was particularly useful.  I just feel that if he could get his verbal delivery (script?) tightened up to reduce the over-repetition, this would have freed up time to address some of the many details that were omitted or not dealt with thoroughly enough, and indeed the more general concepts of working with child themes.

results.content: This is the third class I've taken of John's, and I like the content , pace, and depth of teaching. I find that I know more from his courses than I've gleaned in the last year on my own. This is a great value!
results.content_html: This is the third class I've taken of John's, and I like the content , pace, and depth of teaching. I find that I know more from his courses than I've gleaned in the last year on my own. This is a great value!

results.content: This course is very helpful, and it wasn't too difficult even though I'm a n00b when it comes to coding. I recommend it to anyone who wants to customize their Wordpress site.
results.content_html: This course is very helpful, and it wasn't too difficult even though I'm a n00b when it comes to coding. I recommend it to anyone who wants to customize their Wordpress site.

results.content: The content of the course was easy to follow along with and explained in a way that most people new to WordPress customization could follow along. I also like how the courses build upon the previous courses offered.
results.content_html: The content of the course was easy to follow along with and explained in a way that most people new to WordPress customization could follow along. I also like how the courses build upon the previous courses offered.

results.content: Very clear and simple instructions from start to finish on how to create a child theme from a parent theme on WP. This is the firs very useful tutorial I have find online. Great job!
results.content_html: Very clear and simple instructions from start to finish on how to create a child theme from a parent theme on WP. This is the firs very useful tutorial I have find online. Great job!

results.content: I enjoyed both the wordpress customization 101 and & 102, the instructor is very knowledgeable on the topic and has a genuine desire to teach and help you thoroughly understand the topic, plus he just seems like a really nice guy, which encourages you to keep learning with him.
results.content_html: I enjoyed both the wordpress customization 101 and & 102, the instructor is very knowledgeable on the topic and has a genuine desire to teach and help you thoroughly understand the topic, plus he just seems like a really nice guy, which encourages you to keep learning with him.

results.content: Very good information on how to create a child theme, however some of the methods require updating.  For example @import is no longer the way to include parent style sheets and they also require their own functions.php.  Also, splitting the course took me by surprise.
results.content_html: Very good information on how to create a child theme, however some of the methods require updating. For example @import is no longer the way to include parent style sheets and they also require their own functions.php. Also, splitting the course took me by surprise.

results.content: John goes through a straight forward presentation of creating a child theme and explains why. Very easy to listen to an follow.
results.content_html: John goes through a straight forward presentation of creating a child theme and explains why. Very easy to listen to an follow.

results.content: The course like John's previous courses, was clear and easy to follow. Thank you, John!
results.content_html: The course like John's previous courses, was clear and easy to follow. Thank you, John!

results.content: Clear, concise delivery, well paced and attention grabbing. Great stuff!

results.content: Course is very good, all info required to create WP child themes are covered without investing in WP framework like genesis or ultimatum, This info is more valuable than what I paid for this course,
